pageTitle: White Stuff | Happy-ness in Every Stitch

The winners will be selected at random from all entries no later than Friday 10th July 2015. If any winners cannot be contacted after two (2) attempts within three (3) business days of this date, we reserve the right to select alternate winners., 36509=The winner will be selected from all entries no later than midday on Thursday 16th July., 59323=The Promotion opens at 00:01am on 4th June and closes at midnight on 5th July 2015., 69921=The winner will be selected from all entries no later than Friday 1st May 2015, 59575=The prize is a family ticket to the White Stuff Get Together at the WoWo campsite in Sussex from Friday 21st – Sunday 23rd August., 69018=The Promotion opens at 00:01am on Monday 13th April and closes at midnight Sunday 23rd August 2015., 39629=The prize is a family ticket to the White Stuff Get Together at the Wowo campsite in Sussex from Friday 21st - Sunday 23rd August.}
textBeforeTable: The promotion opens at 9am every Thursday in the run up to the Get Together and ends at midnight on the same day .i.e. We will be giving away one (1) family ticket each week until the Get Together. PROMOTION PERIOD White Stuff reserves the right to refuse admission and/or eject any person(s) who is under the influence of alcohol or drugs, or who in their opinion may provoke a breach of the peace, jeopardise the health, safety and enjoyment of others, or damage the fame and reputation of the event. Children (under 16s) remain the responsibility of, and should be supervised by, their legal guardians at all times. White Stuff accepts no responsibility for any loss, injury or damages sustained within the Venue. There is no cash alternative. Any additional costs incurred, including travel to and from the venue, are at the personal cost of the entrant. There are six (6) family tickets to be won. Each ticket permits entry for two (2) adults and up to four (4) children (aged 16 and under). The prize is a family ticket to the White Stuff Get Together at the Wowo campsite in Sussex from Friday 21st - Sunday 23rd August. PRIZE There is no entry fee and no purchase required. Entrants must like the 'Golden Ticket' post on White Stuff's Facebook timeline, and comment with what White Stuff means to them in one word. HOW TO
textAfterTable: Only entries received by White Stuff after the opening date and time, and before the closing date  and time will be included in the prize draw. SELECTION OF WINNER The winning entry will be picked at random. The winner will be selected from all entries no later than midday on the following Day i.e. Draw no. Promotion Day Promotion Date Announcement Date Announcement Time 1 Thursday 09/07/2015 10/07/2015 13:00:00 2 Thursday 16/07/2015 17/07/2015 13:00:00 3 Thursday 23/07/2015 24/07/2015 13:00:00 4 Thursday 30/07/2015 31/07/2015 13:00:00 5 Thursday 06/08/2015 07/08/2015 13:00:00 6 Thursday 13/08/2015 14/08/2015 13:00:00 If the winner cannot be contacted after two (2) attempts within three (3) business days of the decision date, we reserve the right to select an alternate winner. We reserve the right to select an alternative winner in the event that we have reasonable grounds for believing that a winner has contravened any of these Terms and Conditions. The name and home county of the winner will be available for one (1) month after the winner is chosen by sending a stamped self-addressed envelope
